about_the_game:
You're a farmer in a small village, and you head into town on the day of the town fair, but out of nowhere, the princess is kidnapped by an orc, and it's your job to rescue her and maybe save the world along the way.

Fight through over 8 dungeons, with 12 completely optional dungeons, with the goal of testing your skill and making you harder to kill.

Fight through time and save Nakimbo island from the evil beings that lurk in the desert, along with a mysterious person who lives in a far away swamp, and unravel the mysteries, just be sure to think carefully about your decisions, as some have disastrous consequences.

Use abilities not meant for your class:
along your journey there are many types of orbs, and when these orbs are used they allow the chosen person to gain powers that would normally not be available to their class, have a farmer shoot fireballs out of their hands or have a thief bring thunder down from the sky

Use the right tool for the job:
Instead of choosing the best possible weapon, you may want to stratergise, bring the best possible weapon that you can get in order to properly equip yourself instead of using the same weapons that you always do.

Change gear on the fly:
If you're in the middle of a battle and the enemy starts to change up what attacks they do, that won't leave you defenceless, use special orbs to change what abilities you have and you're current weapons and armour

only complete what you want to:
With 12 optional dungeons, each with a unique gimmick and giving you special weapons not found anywhere else, making enemies easier to defeat, along with all of them having special properties not used by other weapons

Level up without game overs:
Head to an armoury and you might be able to increase skills like attack by battling training dummies, or fight against advanced battlebots, designed to tell when you're weak and stop fighting, however you want to get stronger, you can choose.

Choose the right decisions:
NPC's remember what is said to them, so make sure to say the right thing, otherwise you could lose a potential ally.

Spice up your party:
Most NPC's would like to join you on your quest, but don't accept all of them, as there can only be 4 people at once, although some might have huge advantages, they most likely have flaws that may make battles harder, but the decisions are all up to you.

  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: An evil being has stolen the king's daughter and is on their way to bring ruin to Nakimbo island, fight through dungeons and rescue the king's daughter, just make sure not to destroy the world whilst you're at it.
